thread.title: UK: car sales down, consumers running out of road?

title: UK: car sales down, consumers running out of road?
text:
UK: car sales down, consumers running out of road? Friday, January 05, 2018 - 01:50 
UK consumer confidence appears to be hurting a slew of British businesses with surveys out on Friday showing new car sales dropped more than 5 percent last year, while December retail figures also fell for the fifth straight year. Kate King reports.
